org.sensorhub.impl.module

Class AbstractModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.AbstractModule<ConfigType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, IModule<ConfigType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSensorModule, AbstractStreamProcess, AdminUIModule, BasicSecurityRealm, BasicStorageImpl, GenericStreamStorage, HttpServer, InMemoryBasicStorage, SOSService, SOSTClient, SPSService, TCPCommProvider, UDPCommProvider

    public abstract class AbstractModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
extends Object
implements IModule<ConfigType>

    Class providing default implementation of common module API methods

    Since:
    Oct 30, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      org.slf4j.Logger getLogger() 
      String getName()
      Helper method to get the module's name
      String getStatusMessage() 
      void init()
      Initializes the module synchronously with the current configuration.
      Implementations of this method must block until the module is successfully initialized or send an exception.
      Module lifecycle events may not be generated when calling this method directly.
      void init(ConfigType config)
      Initializes the module synchronously with the specified configuration.
      Implementations of this method must block until the module is successfully initialized or send an exception.
      This is equivalent to calling IModule.setConfiguration(ModuleConfig) and then IModule.init() with no arguments.
      Module lifecycle events may not be generated when calling this method directly.
      boolean isInitialized()
      Checks if module is initialized
      boolean isStarted()
      Checks if module is started
      void loadState(IModuleStateManager loader)
      Restores the state of this module
      Implementations of this method must block until the module state is successfully loaded or send an exception.
      protected void notifyConnectionStatus(boolean connected, String remoteServiceName)
      Helper method to send and log connection/disconnection events
      void registerListener(IEventListener listener)
      Registers a listener to receive events generated by this module.
      When this method is called, the current state of the module is also notified synchronously to guarantee that the listener always receives it.
      void reportError(String msg, Throwable error)
      Sets the module error state and sends corresponding event
      void reportError(String msg, Throwable error, boolean logAsDebug)
      Sets the module error state and sends corresponding event
      void reportStatus(String msg)
      Sets the module status message and sends corresponding event
      void requestInit(boolean force)
      Requests to initialize the module with the current configuration.
      Implementations of this method block until the module is initialized or return immediately while they wait for the proper init conditions.
      When this method returns without error the module state is guaranteed to be ModuleEvent.ModuleState.INITIALIZING
      void requestStart()
      Requests the module to start.
      Implementations of this method may block until the module is started or return immediately while they wait for the proper start conditions.
      When this method returns without error the module state is guaranteed to be ModuleEvent.ModuleState.STARTING
      void requestStop()
      Requests the module to stop.
      Implementations of this method may block until the module is stopped or return immediately while they wait for the proper stop conditions.
      When this method returns without error the module state is guaranteed to be ModuleEvent.ModuleState.STOPPING
      void saveState(IModuleStateManager saver)
      Saves the state of this module.
      Implementations of this method must block until the module state is successfully saved or send an exception.
      void setConfiguration(ConfigType config)
      Sets the module configuration
      protected void setState(ModuleEvent.ModuleState newState)
      Sets the module state and sends the appropriate event if it has changed
      String toString() 
      void unregisterListener(IEventListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener and thus stop receiving events generayed by this module
      void updateConfig(ConfigType config)
      Updates the module's configuration dynamically.
      The module must honor this new configuration unless an error is detected.
      boolean waitForState(ModuleEvent.ModuleState state, long timeout)
      Waits until the module reaches the specified state or times out.
      This method will return immediately if the state has already been reached.

      • updateConfig

        public void updateConfig(ConfigType config)
                  throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Updates the module's configuration dynamically.
        The module must honor this new configuration unless an error is detected. It is the responsability of the module to initiate a restart if the new configuration requires it.
        Specified by:
        updateConfig in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Throws:
        SensorHubException

      • waitForState

        public boolean waitForState(ModuleEvent.ModuleState state,
                   long timeout)
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Waits until the module reaches the specified state or times out.
        This method will return immediately if the state has already been reached.
        Specified by:
        waitForState in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Parameters:
        state - state to wait for
        timeout - maximum time to wait in milliseconds or <= 0 to wait forever
        Returns:
        true if module state has been reached, false in case of timeout or error

      • requestInit

        public void requestInit(boolean force)
                 throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Requests to initialize the module with the current configuration.
        Implementations of this method block until the module is initialized or return immediately while they wait for the proper init conditions.
        When this method returns without error the module state is guaranteed to be ModuleEvent.ModuleState.INITIALIZING
        Specified by:
        requestInit in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Parameters:
        force - set to true to force a reinit, even if module was already initialized
        Throws:
        SensorHubException - if module could not enter initialization phase

      • init

        public void init()
          throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Initializes the module synchronously with the current configuration.
        Implementations of this method must block until the module is successfully initialized or send an exception.
        Module lifecycle events may not be generated when calling this method directly.
        Specified by:
        init in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Throws:
        SensorHubException

      • init

        public void init(ConfigType config)
          throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Initializes the module synchronously with the specified configuration.
        Implementations of this method must block until the module is successfully initialized or send an exception.
        This is equivalent to calling IModule.setConfiguration(ModuleConfig) and then IModule.init() with no arguments.
        Module lifecycle events may not be generated when calling this method directly.
        Specified by:
        init in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Throws:
        SensorHubException

        Throws:

      • requestStart

        public void requestStart()
                  throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Requests the module to start.
        Implementations of this method may block until the module is started or return immediately while they wait for the proper start conditions.
        When this method returns without error the module state is guaranteed to be ModuleEvent.ModuleState.STARTING
        Specified by:
        requestStart in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Throws:
        SensorHubException - if startup could not be initiated

        Requests the module to stop.
        Implementations of this method may block until the module is stopped or return immediately while they wait for the proper stop conditions.
        When this method returns without error the module state is guaranteed to be ModuleEvent.ModuleState.STOPPING
        Specified by:
        requestStop in interface IModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
        Throws:
        SensorHubException - if shutdown could not be initiated
